SELECT ah.csp_type AS csp_type , ah.event_type AS event_type , ah.resource_id AS resource_id , ah.resource_type AS resource_type , ah.occure_dt AS occure_time , ah.urgency AS urgency , ah.plan AS plan , ah.note AS note , ah.project_cd AS project_cd , ah.account_id AS account_id FROM alarm_history ah LEFT JOIN servicegroup_meta sm ON ah.resource_id = sm.csp_instanceid WHERE 1=1
AND ah.csp_type IN
#{selectedCsp}
AND (ah.project_cd IN
#{selectedProject}
OR sm.service_cd IN
#{selectedProject} ) AND ah.occure_date >= DATE_SUB(#{curDate}, INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY ah.occure_dt DESC
